page.title: 20CONCLUSIONS
page.content: The children and staff, of Moore C.P.School, who were involved in this project have found it both exciting and fulfilling.Both farmers and industrialists in the area must be thanked for their ready cooperation. Two ladies,Mrs.Ann Tall and Mrs Edna Deprez,both members of the local Women's Institute,are also thanked for discovering many interesting facts for the project.Mrs. J. MacDonald is also thanked for the taking of the photographs and for helping with the typing of the text pages.We hope that the information we have gathered will be of use and interest to the users of the data base.
